headline: Fortinet Named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Hybrid Mesh Firewall
summary: Fortinet placed highest in Ability to ExecuteSUNNYVALE, Calif., Aug. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- News SummaryFortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, today announced it has been recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Hybrid Mesh Firewall (HMF) and was positioned highest for Ability to Execute. headline: Fortinet Captures EMEA Momentum: Can It Secure Long-Term Growth?
summary: FTNT's EMEA revenues jump 18% in Q2, outpacing other regions and beating estimates, making the region central to its growth strategy.

headline: Anteriad Advances Global Growth Strategy with Senior Executive Promotions in APAC
summary: Jake Phibbs and Josh Lord Elevated to Key Roles in Asia-Pacific MarketsRye Brook, New York, Aug. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anteriad, a global leader in AI and data-driven, tech-enabled B2B marketing, today announced the promotions of Jake Phibbs to Executive Vice President, Sales–APAC, and Josh Lord to Senior Vice President, Sales–ANZ. These appointments underscore Anteriad’s continued investment in global expansion and reflect the company’s momentum as it strengthens its presence worldwide.

raw.headline: Anteriad Advances Global Growth Strategy with Senior Executive Promotions in APAC
raw.summary: Jake Phibbs and Josh Lord Elevated to Key Roles in Asia-Pacific MarketsRye Brook, New York, Aug. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anteriad, a global leader in AI and data-driven, tech-enabled B2B marketing, today announced the promotions of Jake Phibbs to Executive Vice President, Sales–APAC, and Josh Lord to Senior Vice President, Sales–ANZ. These appointments underscore Anteriad’s continued investment in global expansion and reflect the company’s momentum as it strengthens its presence worldwide.
